90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Michael,
Aww you are so sweet thank you! Please feel free to schedule a time to speak by clicking here.
Thanks! Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Michael Littleton [mailto:littletonsmail@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 01, 2012 12:40 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Contact information For Sara at MBO Partners
Let talk and get things rolling. I will send you some dates and times in the morning to have a call.
Thank you for your help..
And I got a Linkedin invite from you. You didn't say you were pretty. :) great pix. I so need to get a good one for mine. LOL
Talk with you soon.
--- On Tue, 1/31/12, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote:
From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> Subject: RE: Contact information For Sara at MBO Partners To: "littletonsmail@yahoo.com" <littletonsmail@yahoo.com> Date: Tuesday, January 31, 2012, 2:39 PM Hi Mike,
Hope you are doing well. Just wanted to follow up with you  did you end up working with Crescent as a W-2?
Take care, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners

From: Sara Conde Sent: Friday, January 20, 2012 4:57 PM To: 'littletonsmail@yahoo.com' Subject: Contact information For Sara at MBO Partners
Hi Mike,
So nice speaking with you! To summarize our call you are going to go back to crescent to confirm if the $70 per hour that they would offer you outside of our program is corp to corp (1099) or if it is W-2. If its $70 on a W-2 you should go with their payroll option. If its $70 on a 1099 our program would be of benefit to you and we can create a financial snap shot and go into the service offerings in greater detail.
Looking forward to hear what they come back with!
Take care, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
